item.title: resume
item.description: Timothy Heidcamp 1 Olde Orchard Park Apt136 | South Burlington, VT 05403 | Cell : (845) 532-9388 | heidthecamp@gmail.com Summary I’m currently a senior at Champlain College’s Computer Science and Innovation (CSI) program with a love for learning new programming languages and design patterns. Outside of courses, I’ve developed several small home programming projects as well as participating in Vermont’s civic hackathon, HackVT, competition 3 years in a row.
